root.name: Gungriffon
root.description: OverviewGungriffon is a mech combat game developed by Game Arts and released for the Sega Saturn in 1996. It focuses on the piloting of large bipedal mechas called Armored Warling Gun Systems (AWGS). The game takes place in the year 2074, where global warming and declining human resources have created worldwide political conflict, causing war to break out in Europe and Asia.
